title: Meerut Children Welfare Trust
detailsOfAchievement: Meerut Children Welfare Trust, working for the cause of mentally challenged children for more than 20 yrs, has its own building & is fully equipped to meet out all special needs of mentally challenged children under one roof which includes special educator, speech therapy, physiotherapy, occupational therapy, psychological counseling, behavioral modification, pre- vocational training, music therapy, craft and computer application etc. Presently one hundred & ten (110) children are getting its above services. It also provides vocational training in sheltered workshops to few children. It also runs a early intervention clinic and diploma course in D.Ed SE(MR).

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Pradhan Mantri Gramin Digital Saksharta Abhiyaan is the scheme to make six crore persons in rural areas, across States/UTs, digitally literate, reaching to around 40% of rural households by covering one member from every eligible household by 31st March, 2019. The Scheme would empower the citizens in rural areas by training them to operate computer or digital access devices (like tablets, smart phones etc.), send and receive e-mails, browse Internet, access Government services.

National Digital Literacy Mission (NDLM) has been initiated with the vision to empower at least one person per household with crucial digital literacy skills by 2020. This is expected to touch the lives of more than 250 million individuals over the next few years. NDLM is an effort to complement governments vision to transform one from each household as digitally literate.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: FUTURE PLAN/TARGETS TO ACHIEVE IN NEXT FIVE YEARS Since its inception the Society has been striving hard on its own to create an amicable atmosphere for education in the locality. Its importance of existence has been increased manifolds with the fact that no other school facility is available even in the surrounding area. Now the Society has 550 sq. ft. land where the building for school and office is required. There is no source of Funding for the Non government organization it has self S O F.

Moulana Azad Memorial Public School Society was founded in the year 1998-1999 and registered with the Indian Society Act. The Society has been existed in Aseelpur, Meerut with the aim to look-after the welfare of the minority community of the area in terms of education, self defense, technical knowledge (e.g. computer courses etc) and knitting. Due to the absence of school in the vicinity the children of the area had been wandering aimlessly

it is of paramount importance to have at-least the one for the vicinity. No one in the village has ever attended the school as no facility was existed near the vicinity but few responsible members of the place become cognizant of the situation
